701449f-a.text:
Meagher Ave., west side, between Schurz and Chaffee Aves., showing an old stone house and the rear of a large barn, the front of which faces on the west side of the avenue. These were formerly part of the
Thomas J. Havemeyer estate. The view is southward.
July 25, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
701449f-a.folder: Meagher Avenue & Schurz Avenue, Bronx, NY
